skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with exceptional design quality and creative aesthetics.
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only instructional markdown content with no executable code. All 28 high-severity static findings for weak cryptographic algorithms are false positives from pattern matching on common English words. The 3 system reconnaissance detections are also false positives. The skill provides design guidance for creating frontend interfaces and poses no security risk.

content.value_statement: Many AI-generated interfaces look generic and lack creative character. This skill guides Claude Code to create production-grade web interfaces with exceptional aesthetic quality, distinctive visual identity, and thoughtful design decisions that avoid common AI patterns.
actual_capabilities: Generate production-ready HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code for web interfaces
Create React, Vue, or vanilla JavaScript components with distinctive aesthetics
Implement sophisticated CSS animations and micro-interactions
Design cohesive color schemes and typography systems using CSS variables
Build responsive layouts with creative spatial composition and asymmetric designs
Apply advanced visual techniques like gradient meshes, noise textures, and layered effects
limitations: Does not generate backend code or server-side logic
Cannot load external design assets or font files automatically
Does not perform user testing or accessibility audits
Requires user to specify technical framework preferences and constraints

use_cases.title: Product Landing Page
use_cases.description: Create a visually striking landing page for a new product with bold typography, engaging animations, and a distinctive color palette that captures brand identity.

use_cases.title: Dashboard Interface
use_cases.description: Build a data visualization dashboard with creative layouts, thoughtful spacing, and memorable visual elements that make complex information accessible and engaging.

use_cases.title: Portfolio Website
use_cases.description: Design a personal portfolio site with unique aesthetic direction, sophisticated transitions, and creative component patterns that showcase individual style.

prompt_templates.prompt: Create a contact form component with email and message fields

prompt_templates.scenario: Creating a section with specific brand direction

prompt_templates.title: Interactive Dashboard
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a metrics dashboard for a SaaS platform with a brutalist aesthetic, featuring bold typography, high contrast colors, and grid-based layouts

prompt_templates.prompt: Create a task management app in React with a retro-futuristic design, including animated task cards, gradient backgrounds, custom fonts, and smooth page transitions

output_examples.input: Create a pricing card component with a luxury aesthetic
output_examples.output: The skill generates a React component with refined typography, subtle animations, sophisticated color gradients, elegant hover effects, and detailed spacing that creates a premium feel.

output_examples.input: Build a blog post header with a brutalist design approach
output_examples.output: The skill creates HTML and CSS featuring bold system fonts, high contrast black and white colors, asymmetric layouts, raw borders, and minimal but impactful visual elements.

output_examples.input: Design a navigation menu with playful animations
output_examples.output: The skill implements a menu with bouncy transitions, colorful hover states, creative icon animations, and micro-interactions that make navigation feel delightful and engaging.

best_practices: Provide clear context about the purpose, audience, and brand identity when requesting designs to help guide aesthetic choices
Specify your preferred technical framework such as React, Vue, or vanilla HTML/CSS to ensure compatible code generation
Describe your desired aesthetic direction using specific terms like minimalist, brutalist, retro-futuristic, or organic to get more distinctive results
anti_patterns: Requesting generic designs without aesthetic direction leads to less distinctive results
Asking for multiple unrelated components in one request dilutes creative focus and cohesion
Providing only functional requirements without design context limits the creative potential of the output

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill can generate code for vanilla HTML/CSS/JavaScript, React, Vue, and other modern frontend frameworks. Specify your preference in your request.

faq.question: Can this skill create accessible interfaces?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill follows semantic HTML practices and includes ARIA labels when appropriate. However, comprehensive accessibility audits should be performed separately.

faq.question: How do I get more creative or unique designs?
faq.answer: Provide specific aesthetic direction such as brutalist, art deco, organic, or maximalist. Describe the mood, audience, and purpose to help guide distinctive creative choices.

faq.question: Will the generated code work in production?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill generates production-ready code with proper structure and best practices. Review and test the code in your specific environment before deployment.

faq.question: Can I request specific fonts or colors?
faq.answer: Yes, you can specify font families, color palettes, or design tokens. The skill will implement them using CSS variables for consistency and maintainability.

faq.question: Does this skill handle responsive design?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill creates responsive layouts using modern CSS techniques like flexbox, grid, and media queries to ensure designs work across different screen sizes.
